main_page.easiest_way: The easiest way to buy, sell and trade digital currency.
main_page.howto_text_1: To start trading, you are required to open an Kuailian account. Our resources will guide you through the basics of trading, help you open an account, and explain why is it important to have it secure. No matter your experience.
main_page.howto_text_2: Our support team is available 24/7, 365 days a year, for you. In that way, we are making sure your questions are answered and your issues are resolved, no matter in which time zone you are.
main_page.howto_text_3: We believe confidence is essential to trading or anything individuals set out to do. Our digital assets have been secured in the business because the trust of our clients has been our priority.
main_page.regulation_subtitle: Crosschange Bank Pro is managed by Crosschange International OU, a regulated and licensed digital currency service provider, by the Financial Intelligence Unit of the Republic of Estonia. Our financial licenses include:
main_page.regulation_section_1_text: License FVR000971 Financial services, providing services of exchanging a virtual currency against a fiat currency.
main_page.regulation_section_2_text: License FVR000971 Financial services, providing services of exchanging a virtual currency against a fiat currency.
